welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bulisa, Uganda! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and embrace all that Bulisa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pakuba Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pakuba Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kabalega Falls Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kabalega Falls Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
